title: Multicenter validation of a machine learning model to predict intensive care unit readmission within 48 hours after discharge
details: L Lim, M Kim, K Cho, D Yoo, D Sim, HG Ryu, HC Lee - eClinicalMedicine, 2025
abstract: Background Intensive care unit (ICU) readmission is a crucial indicator of patient safety. However, discharge decisions often rely on subjective assessment due to a lack of standardized guidelines. We aimed to develop a machine-learning model to …
